local_intent: Approach above the white_plate with 5 cm clearance after confirming detection, then verify position.
assumptions: IsAt(target=white_plate) is considered satisfied when the end-effector is at the pose associated with the detected white_plate at the specified offset.
coherence_with_global: Implements the global step MoveAbove(target=white_plate, offset_z=0.05, timeout_ms=1500) preceded by robust detection and followed by a positional check, matching the GLOBAL_BT ordering and task description.
